posts.title: Smart Vault Biometric Safe
posts.content: Keep your firearm from falling into the wrong hands while still keeping it easily accessible by storing it inside this smart vault biometric safe. Capable of storing up to 15 different fingerprints, it’s designed so you can easily open it up with the swipe of your finger.

posts.title: Goldfish Soccer Game
posts.content: Train your fish to become the next Pelé with this goldfish soccer game. Included in this unique fish training kit – yes, fish can be trained! – is a variety of cool things to interact with such as a soccer goal, and it even comes with a 45 minute training DVD.

posts.title: Black Cat Stockings
posts.content: The black cat stockings will bring you anything but bad luck – unless you happen to cross your legs. They’re the stylish stockings designed to turn your plain legs into a pair of cute black cats, complete with an adorable curvy tail in the back.

posts.title: Night Time Heat Free Hair Curlers
posts.content: Give your straight locks some much needed volume without harming your hair by going to bed with these night time heat free hair curlers. Simply wrap your hair around these extra-absorbent, memory-foam core curlers to wake up with magnificent curls in the morning.

posts.title: Strawberry Kit Kat Bar
posts.content: Take a break from your busy day and spend a little time getting to know the deliciously unusual strawberry Kit Kat bar. This delectable candy treats your taste buds to the classic taste you’ve grown to love then hits them with a blast of strawberry – simply heavenly.

posts.title: Light Up Star Pillow
posts.content: Just like in Super Mario, you can now become invincible by picking up a light up star – except this one also doubles as a comfy pillow. The light up star pillow is a battery operated color changing throw pillow that is a great gift idea for sleepovers and Super Mario fans.

posts.title: Mini Collapsible Crib
posts.content: Provide your bundle of joy with a comfy place to rest his/her head without taking away precious space in your cluttered home by using the mini collapsible crib. Apart from the compact rectangular design, it features special hinges that allow you to fold it for easy storage.

posts.title: NES Retro Receiver
posts.content: Bring your old school console into the twenty-first century using this NES retro receiver. It allows you to use wireless controllers on your original NES system and is designed to support all 8Bitdo controllers and arcade sticks.

posts.title: You Have Just Been Poisoned Glass
posts.content: Scare the hell out of your guests with these terrifying “You Have Just Been Poisoned” glasses. Perfect for serving drinks to people you secretly hate, or for just playing pranks on friends, the “You Have Just Been Poisoned” glass has a variety of evil applications.

posts.title: Inflatable Floating Sofa
posts.content: Get ready for the ultimate lounging experience — this inflatable sofa combines pool lounging with couch lounging. Slap on some sunscreen, turn up your headphones, and get your tanning and napping gears ready to grind. A perfect accessory for the professional lounger.

posts.title: Shaved Ice Snow Cone Machine
posts.content: Beat the heat by treating yourself to a delicious homemade snow cone using this shaved ice snow cone machine. It features a transparent 360 chamber that lets you see as the cone is being made and comes with stainless steel blades that shave the ice just right.

posts.title: LEGO Creator Taj Mahal Set
posts.content: Recreate one of the world’s most iconic architectural wonders by taking on this LEGO creator Taj Mahal set. You’ll be able to marvel at the structural beauty of this iconic landmark up close as you painstakingly put together its almost 6,000 pieces!
